page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content: Some children play with BMX bikes at the waste ground nearby;some go to the adventure playground or watch video films and television.Others go to sunbathe on the beach or to the funfair.Children play games in the park or on the street(avoiding cars).I like to go to town and buy clothes. Adults garden,read,knit,paint,or walk in the country. Others do the housework or do-it-yourself work.Energetic adults play squash,cricket, badminton,tennis or football.There are many clubs for photography,cards(bridge),acting,films ,writing,knitting,birdwatching,dress-m aking, flower arranging.Many adults go to nightclasses,either to study exam subjects or just for recreation,such as playing the guitar,or learning about herbs.
